recipe.title: Green Machine Baby Food (11+ Months) Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 5 oz ; spinach, washed and steamed ; (140 g)
5 oz ; peas, washed and steamed ; (140 g)
2 ; kiwis, peeled, If kiwi is unripe, you can steam it
water, can be breast milk or formula

steps.step: Add spinach, peas, kiwi, and water, breast milk, or formula to a blender or food processor. Blend very well.
Refrigerate up to 3 days or freeze up to 1 month.
NOTE: Check with your pediatrician before introducing new foods to children under 12 months.

steps_updated.steps_updated: Add spinach, peas, kiwi, and water, breast milk, or formula to a blender or food processor.
Refrigerate up to 3 days or freeze up to 1 month.
NOTE: Check with your pediatrician before introducing new foods to children under 12 months.
